name: hellyhansenautomation
description: Helly Hansen automation template with Playwright

scripts.test:qa:sanity:chrome: TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/specs/ --grep @loginpage --project=chromium --trace on
scripts.test:qa:smoke:firefox: (TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/specs/ --grep @smoke --project=firefox --reporter=line,allure-playwright) && (npm run postTest)
scripts.test:qa:smoke:mustoCountry:iPhone12: (TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/specs/ --grep @Banner --project='Mobile safari' --reporter=line,allure-playwright) && (npm run postTest)
scripts.postTest: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report

author: GSPANN
